🤔 I am moderately economically left-wing ⬅️ and socially centrist ⚖️.

🗳️ I wanted to vote Reform UK 🟦, but I tactically voted Conservative 🟦 in 2024.

🚫 I voted to leave the EU in 2016 and 🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 👍 Agree: There is one law for the rich and one for the poor.
• 😐 Neutral on: People who break the law should be given stiffer sentences.
• ⚖️ Income equality requires a balanced approach.

• 🌏 The UK should allow many more immigrants.

• 🤷 Government should be less concerned about equal incomes.

Some opinions I hold:
• ♀️ Attempts to give equal opportunities to women are about right.
• 😐 Neutral on: Schools should teach children to obey authority.
• 👍 Agree: Workplaces should end mandatory diversity training.

• 🗳️ Seats in parliament should match vote percentages.
• 👍 Agree: Young people today don't have enough respect for traditional British values.
• 👎 Disagree: Censorship of films and magazines is necessary to uphold moral standards.

🤔 I am moderately economically left-wing ⬅️ and moderately socially liberal 🕊️.

🗳️ I voted Labour 🟥 in 2024. In 2019, I voted Liberal Democrat 🟧.

🇪🇺 I voted to remain in the EU in 2016 and 🇪🇺 I would vote to rejoin the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 👍 Agree: There is one law for the rich and one for the poor.
• 😊 Most people can be trusted.
• 👎 Disagree: People who break the law should be given stiffer sentences.

Some opinions I hold:
• ⚖️ Immigration has mixed or neutral impacts on Britain.

• ⚖️ The UK's current immigration levels are about right.

🚫 I voted to leave the EU in 2016 and 🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 💯 Strongly agree: Censorship of films and magazines is necessary to uphold moral standards.
• 💯 Strongly agree: For some crimes, the death penalty is the most appropriate sentence.
• ⚖️ We need a balance between the environment and growth.

• 🤝 Attempts to give equal opportunities to ethnic minorities are about right.

🤔 I am strongly economically left-wing ⬅️ and moderately socially authoritarian 🔒.

🗳️ I voted Reform UK 🟦 in 2024.

🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 👍 Agree: Ordinary working people do not get their fair share of the nation's wealth.
• 🏛️ One party should have a majority to govern alone.
• ♀️ Attempts to give equal opportunities to women have gone too far.


👤 I'm a white British Anglican ✝️ man from Esher and Walton 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿, aged 39, with a professional qualification. 🏠 I own my home with a mortgage.

💸 Taxation is my top issue.

🤔 I am moderately economically right-wing ➡️ and strongly socially authoritarian 🔒.

🗳️ I voted Conservative 🟦 in 2024.

🇪🇺 I voted to remain in the EU in 2016 and 🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 💯 Strongly agree: Schools should teach children to obey authority.
• ♀️ Attempts to give equal opportunities to women are about right.
• 🇬🇧 Britain should protect its independence from the EU.


👤 I'm a white British Atheist/Agnostic man from Mid Leicestershire 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿, aged 70, with a professional qualification. 🏠 I own my home outright.

🏠 Housing is my top issue.

🤔 I am economically centrist ⚖️ and moderately socially authoritarian 🔒.

🗳️ I voted Labour 🟥 in 2024.

🇪🇺 I voted to remain in the EU in 2016 and 🇪🇺 I would vote to rejoin the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• ⚖️ Immigration has mixed or neutral impacts on Britain.
• 😐 Neutral on: Management will always try to get the better of employees if it gets the chance.
• 😐 Neutral on: Curriculums should include fewer white male authors and more female and non-white authors.


👤 I'm a white British Anglican ✝️ woman from Milton Keynes Central 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿, aged 66, with a postgraduate degree (Master's or PhD).

🛂 Immigration is my top issue.

🗳️ I voted Conservative 🟦 in 2024.

🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 🚫 Immigration has negative effects on Britain's economy and culture.
• 👍 Agree: Censorship of films and magazines is necessary to uphold moral standards.
• 🗳️ Seats in parliament should match vote percentages.


👤 I'm a white British Methodist ✝️ woman from Houghton and Sunderland South 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿, aged 68, with secondary education (GCSE/O Level). 🏠 I own my home outright.

🏥 Health is my top issue.

🤔 I am moderately economically left-wing ⬅️ and moderately socially authoritarian 🔒.

🗳️ I wanted to vote Green 🟩, but I tactically voted Labour 🟥 in 2024.

🚫 I would vote to stay out of the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 🤔 I neither agree nor disagree about feeling proud to be British.
• 👍 Agree: Censorship of films and magazines is necessary to uphold moral standards.
• ♀️ Attempts to give equal opportunities to women have gone too far.


👤 I'm a white British Atheist/Agnostic woman from Glasgow North East 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿, aged 33, with a postgraduate degree (Master's or PhD).

💲 Living costs are my top issue.

🤔 I am moderately economically left-wing ⬅️ and moderately socially liberal 🕊️.

🗳️ I voted Labour 🟥 in 2024.

🇪🇺 I would vote to rejoin the EU today.

Some opinions I hold:
• 👍 Agree: Big business takes advantage of ordinary people.
• 🤝 Attempts to give equal opportunities to ethnic minorities are about right.
• 👎 Disagree: Young people today don't have enough respect for traditional British values.
